turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I'd like to check my current account balance, please.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Certainly. Could you please verify the last four digits of your account number and your date of birth?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you. Your current account balance is $2,542.78.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, thanks. Can you also tell me what the interest rate is on my savings account? I can never find it on the website.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I can help with that. Please provide the last four digits of your savings account number.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: It's 5678. Also, why are interest rates so low these days? When will they go up?

I recommend consulting a financial advisor for that type of information.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Ugh, okay, that's what I figured. Thanks anyway. That's all I need for now.
